item.title: Artistic Love package from €59.50pp at the Bloom! hotel Brussels
item.body:
Culture and art package for 2 at the Bloom! hotel: 1 night + buffet breakfast + ticket to the Magritte museum + map of Brussels.

Do you love art? The Bloom hotel offers a 100% Art and Culture holiday that you can reserve year-round:
  • 1 night in an L-shaped double room,
  • 1 WOOW breakfast buffet at OO!,
  • 1 ticket per person to the Magritte museum,
  • 1 map of the city.

Bloom! hotel, your designer hotel in the centre of Brussels


The Bloom! lies next to the Botanical garden, within a stone's throw of the centre of Brussels.

The hotel has 287 rooms, all of which with unique frescoes. Each one has been painted by young European artists, each in a different style, but all of them following the "bloom" theme.

The result is an incomparable view of contemporary art in Europe!

Start your day by admiring your unique room, leave your luggage and head off to discover the over 120 museums that Brussels has to offer.

First stop: the famous Magritte museum!
  • Offer based on shared occupancy,
  • subject to availability.

item.title: Business package - Le Châtelain Boutique Hotel
item.body:
Excellent for Business Travellers visiting the Capital of Europe
 
This Package offers:
 
- One night in one of our luxurious rooms
- Breakfast buffet at our B'Artist café
- Free access to our fitness center
- Free daily newspapers
- Free Internet access
- City map
- Free access to our in-door Parking
- Box of Belgian chocolate.
 
 
179 € per room per night
 
For minimum 2 night stay. (Possible for an additional person, with a supplement of 25 €)

item.title: Family package - Hotel Siru
item.body:
2 adults and 2 children
This Package includes:
 
- 2 connecting rooms
- Breakfast for the whole family included
- City map at the reception
- 1 chocolate box in the room
- 2 voucher for Mini-Europe (Located at the foot of the Atomium, MINI-EUROPE is the only park where you can have a whitlestop tour around Europe in a few short hours. A truly unique voyage! Stroll amid the typical ambiance of the most beautiful towns of the Old Continent.)
 
Total price per night: 159 €

item.title: Weekend with the Girls from €37.50pp at Hotel BLOOM! Brussels
item.body:
Want a weekend shopping trip with the girls? Hotel BLOOM! in Brussels offers you: 1 night with breakfast and one glass of Cava at SmoodS.

Come and spend a girlie weekend at the trendy Hotel BLOOM! in the heart of the capital of Europe. Enjoy:

  • 1 night in a Standard Double room with breakfast buffet,
  • 1 glass of Cava per person at SmoodS,
  • 1 map of the city.

Your girls' weekend in Brussels


The hotel is ideally situated only a few steps from the city's largest shopping street, perfect for a day of shopping with the girls.

When the sun goes down, relax in SmoodS the hotel's Bar-Restaurant. It's a unique and trendy spot that offers you 7 different spaces and atmospheres.

Hotel BLOOM!, a designer hotel in the heart of Brussels


Hotel BLOOM! benefits from a dream location in the city centre, next to the Botanical Gardens.

Its decor and its exceptional rooms will give you a unique experience. Each of its rooms has been designed by a different artist.

Treat yourself to a weekend of relaxation and retail therapy with the girls!
  • Offer valid based on occupancy of a Double room,
  • Citytax supplement of €5.95 per room per night,
  • The Bar-Restaurant is closed on Sundays.

item.title: Special "Girly" Package from 67,50€ pp at Silken Berlaymont Hotel
item.body:
Special deal at the Silken Berlaymont Hotel Brussels: 1 night in double room with breakfast, voucher for make-up or manicure, Spa and glass of Cava.

Take a trip to Brussels with the girls. Discover the Silken Berlaymont Hotel Brussels "Girly" pack:
  • 1 night in double room with breakfast,
  • 1 free glass of Cava on arrival,
  • 1 voucher for 1 make-up session or a manicure
  • acces to the hotel's Relax Spa.
  • 1 20€ voucher for ICI PARIS XL
 

Silken Berlaymont Hotel Brussels, the European quarter's 4-star hotel


The Silken Berlaymont offers you a warm welcome and an exclusive location, combined with a modern, comfortable and elegant architecture.

The hotel is situated in the most lively part of the European quarter. From there, you can easily access the city centre and its shopping and main attractions. It's perfect for visiting Brussels with the girls!

During your stay, you can make the most of a voucher entitling you to 1 make-up session or 1 manicure at ICI PARIS XL on Marché aux Herbes next to the Grand-Place.

You can also enjoy a relaxing visit to the hotel's Relax Spa with its sauna, jacuzzi, infra-red cabin, steam bath and fitness room.
  • Offer based on double room occupancy,
  • Valid subject to availability,
Book the Silken Berlaymont Hotel's Girly package and spend some time getting pampered with the girls!

item.title: DEMENCE PACKAGE @ Royal Windsor Grand Place
item.body:
Come to La Demence and stay at the highly recommended official partner the Royal Windsor Hotel Grand'Place, conveniently located in the heart of Brussels at the special rates of 79 Euro for 2 people, including a late check out.
 
Elegant and sophisticated, the Royal Windsor Hotel Grand Place Brussels boasts the best location in Brussels just off the world-famous Grand Place. With 267 rooms, including 16 suites, one Royal Suite and the newly launched Grand Place Suite overlooking the roof tops of Brussels, the Royal Windsor Hotel Grand Place guarantees to provide guests attentive and personalized service.
 
The combination of sheer elegance with the latest sophisticated equipment such as three telephone lines, including a free high-speed SDSL line (LAN access), or wireless Internet will be certain to meet all your requirements for your leisure stay in Brussels. Each guest has free access to the hotel's Fitness Centre, which includes a sauna. The Royal Windsor Hotel's Chutney's bar-restaurant, consider by many as the best restaurant in Brussels offers a diversified menu and memorable cocktails
The hotel is within walking distance from Brussels' Central Station, and also just 15 minutes away to the La Demence.

Your 4 privileged accommodation options which include:
 
- Room night in an elegant and comfortable Superior Room
- Double or single occupancy
- Late check-out at 16h00
- Access to the Fitness Centre & Sauna
 
1 night stay as from 99 Euro in a Superior room
2 night stay as from 89 Euro in a Superior room
3 night stay as from 79 Euro in a Superior room
 
Special rates for 18-26 years old for a 1 night stay at 79 Euro in a Superior room
 
Upon availability. VAT & service included.

item.title: EASY BREEZY PRIDE PACKAGES @ Aloft Brussels Schuman
item.body:
Pride Package 1 includes for 85 euros:
 
- 1 night Accommodation for 2 with breakfast
- Welcome drink for 2
 
Pride Package 2 includes for 129 euros:
 
- 1 night Accommodation for 2 with breakfast
- 2 entrances to La Démence night club
- 2 Taxi vouchers for a round trip to La Démence night club

item.title: RAINBOW PASSION @ Bloom Hotel
item.body:
Have an exclusive stay in hotel BLOOM! and let us pamper you and your partner!
 
Spend an unforgettable night in hotel BLOOM! And no worries, we'll let you sleep late, thanks to the late check-out until 16:00 !
Then visit the gay hotspots in Brussels, thanks to the guide Out in Brussels. If you are also looking for a place to party at night, these are 2 clubs not to miss: La Demence and Le You.
 
Details package:
 
This package includes for 2 persons:
- 1 night in an L room
- Late check-out until 16:00
- Free guide Out in Brussels
 
 
From €75

item.title: SUNGAYS TO YOU PACKAGE @ Best Western Hotel Royal Centre
item.body:
- 1 night in a double room, breakfast and wireless included
- 2 tickets for “You Gay tea Dance” + a bottle of sparkling wine
- 1 gay guide + 1 map gay friendly
 
Late check-out till 2pm
 
 
 
99€/night
 
 
Offer valid every Sunday night

item.title: Artistic Love @ Hotel BLOOM!
item.body:
Love art? Or do you have an artistic side yourself? At Hotel BLOOM! you will be thrilled to see that we have 287 rooms, all with unique fresco’s. Each room has been hand painted by young European artists, all in different styles, but all around the theme “to bloom”. The result is a unique view of contemporary art in Europe! So start your day by admiring your unique room for the night, leave your luggage and start discovering the more than 120 museums Brussels has to offer. First stop: the notorious Magritte Museum!
 
Our offer includes:
• 1 night in an artistic L room
• WOOW Breakfast Buffet in OO!
• Entrance to the Magritte Museum
• Citymap
 
- Have a look on www.hotelbloom.com and choose the fresco you fancy for your stay with us. At check-in be sure to ask if your favorite one is available!
- The famous antiquities area – “Le Sablon” – is at 10 minutes walking distance from the Magritte Museum or just hop on the tram that also stops in front of the hotel. You will find exquisite art galleries, the top of Belgium’s chocolatiers and other interesting boutiques and little cafés.

item.title: Gay Packages Hilton
item.body:
Situated in the center of downtown Brussels, within yards of Gare du Nord station and in close proximity to the Rue Neuve shopping district and the Grand Place, the Hilton Brussels City hotel is the ideal place to stay when you are visiting Belgium’s capital.
Feel at home in the contemporary rooms with wooden floor, high speed internet access and tea & coffee making facilities. Pamper yourself with a Deluxe Room for more space.
After a busy day visiting the charming city of Brussels, you can relax and rejuvenate in the Scandinavian Wellness and Health Club or sample the delicious Belgian cuisine in the Bien Belge Living Lounge restaurant and bar.
Offering warm service and stylish comfort in an central location, this Brussels hotel has everything you need to make the most of your stay in one of Europe’s most vibrant cities.
This package includes:
- Overnight in a Double Hilton Guest Room and breakfast
- Free access to the Scandinavian Wellness and Health Club with Sauna and Hammam
- Free Wifi access
- A bottle of sparkling wine along with Belgian chocolates in the room
- Late check-out up to 15h00 (upon availability)
- A special LGBT map of the city to indicate all the trendy areas in Brussels
 
Promo code : PR10LG

item.title: Funny gay package @ Best Western Hotel Royal Centre
item.body:
1 night in a double room for 2 persons
*Breakfast and Wireless included
*2 tickets to sauna Macho
* Check-out till 14h
* guide Out in Brussels
 
Price: 115€/night/room
Offer valid from friday, saturday, sunday

item.title: Tintin collector experience @Amigo
item.body:
Valid until December 2013

Situated right in the historic centre of Brussels between the Tintin Shop near the Grand Place and a giant mural featuring Tintin Captain Haddock and Snowy the Hotel Amigo has rolled out the red carpet for Belgium's favourite comic strip heroes. A special package has been designed for the pleasure of guests to the capital city of comic strips Brussels.
Hotel Amigo provides the ideal base for anyone wishing to set off on an adventure in Tintin's footsteps; with the inspired Tintin gifts the adventure begins before guests even step out of the building!
 
A fusion of dreams and reality the Tintin-themed tour of Brussels grows year by year. The tour encompasses a journey around the home town of Tintin and his creator Hergé to see some of the many real-life locations that Hergé drew into his stories. Walk through the Brussels park depicted in King Ottokar's Sceptre or visit the concert hall that inspired the Hippodrome in The Seven Crystal Balls.
 
The adventure would not be complete without a visit to the Hergé Museum located 30 minutes from Brussels in Louvain-la-Neuve. The Museum is an astounding piece of contemporary architecture in which the work of the creator of Tintin is exhibited in stunning galleries designed by experts.
 
There is much much more for guests to discover!
 
Our offer includes:
• A luxurious room for one night
• A sumptuous breakfast buffet with delightful homemade pastries and fresh fruits including freshly baked "Belgian waffles".
• Entrance tickets to the newly opened "Hergé Museum" in Louvain la Neuve.
• Special Tintin gifts
• A box of Belgian cookies or chocolates
• Mini-Guide Tintin
 
If you wish to stay in one of our Tintin themed room or suite please call +32 2 547 47 07 or email reservations.amigo@roccofortehotels.com to check rates and availability. These rooms and suite are only bookable directly at the hotel.

item.title: A Tintin family affair @ Amigo
item.body:
Valid until December 2013 

With a myriad of things to do Brussels is the ideal place to spend exceptional time with the whole family.
 
Share a magical weekend with your little ones in the heart of Brussels where many activities are available to keep both adults and children entertained. One step away from the Grand-Place and close to the city's most important attractions you can enjoy the contemporary and elegant atmosphere at the Hotel Amigo whilst savoring relaxed family time.
 
We offer our guests a customized family program with special Tintin amenities goodies and surprises for children. Enjoy the afternoon at the amusing Hergé Museum (Tintin's creator) in Louvain la Neuve discover Tintin's themed Tour around Brussels and then return to the hotel to relax in you room whilst your children play with games or watch specially chosen DVD's.
 
Parents wishing to enjoy fine-dining can go to Ristorante Bocconi one of the best Italian restaurant in the city and can enjoy their meal assured that their children are being well looked after by the hotel's fully qualified babysitting team (available on request).
 
Our offer includes:
• Book a luxurious room and enjoy your kid's room complimentary (for 2 children up to 12 years old)
• A sumptuous breakfast buffet with delightful homemade pastries and fresh fruits including freshly baked "Belgian waffles".
• Children under 3 years of age receive complimentary food and beverages
• Children under 12 years of age receive a 50% reduction on all kids menus
• Entrance tickets to the "Hergé Museum" in Louvain la Neuve.
• Special Tintin gifts
• A box of Belgian cookies or chocolates
• Milk & cookies for the little ones at turndown service
• Special children's bath robes and sleepers
• Complimentary use of the gymnasium
 
How to book this package:
If you wish to stay in one of our Tintin themed room or suite please call +32 2 547 47 07 or email reservations.amigo@roccofortehotels.com to check rates and availability. These rooms and suite are only bookable directly at the hotel.
 
To search for this offer please select 1 room and 2 guests when checking for availability the kid's room will be added to the package automatically.
 
Hergé Museum
Rue du Labrador 26 Anneau central - 1348 Louvain-la-Neuve
info@museeherge.com
http://www.museeherge.com
Opening hours:
- From Tuesday to Friday from 10.30 a.m. to 5.30 p.m
- From Saturday to Sunday from 10 a.m. to 6 p.m.
- Closed on Monday January 1st November 1st November 11th and December 25th.
Our concierge service will be delighted to arrange you transportation by train or private coach to the museum.
 
Tintin Shop
Rue de la colline 13 1000 Brussels
Tel +32 2 514 51 52
Fax +32 2 502 32 57

item.title: Comics heroes @Sandton Pillow
item.body:
Discover the 9th art in Brussels, it is on every corner! Tintin, Yoko Tsuno, Spirou, the Smurfs, Lucky Luke, Bob Morane and many more comics characters adorn the walls of Brussels. You can find the stories of your favourite heroes in many comics bookstores in the area of Sandton’s most recent boutique hotel situated on Place Rouppe.
 
Sandton Pillows Brussels imagined a Comics Package so you can make the most of your visit in Brussels and indulge in your favorite hobby.
 
Content:
-1 night stay
-Entrance Belgian Comic Strip Center
-10% discount voucher at Comics Village
-Chocolate box
-"The Comics in the City" brochure
-Free use of Wifi
-A small bottle of water per person on your room

item.title: This is a Magritte Package @ Hotel Amigo
item.body:
With the opening 4 years ago of the long-awaited Magritte Museum in Brussels the Hotel Amigo decided to present an exceptional cultural package that combines a vibrant dash of imagination-busting Surrealism with some unmistakably 21st-century style and comfort.
 
The René Magritte Museum home to the largest ever collection of paintings by the renowned Belgian-born artist is collaborating with the Hotel Amigo to create a very special experience for visitors.
 
As part of the package guests will receive bed and breakfast accommodation in a luxurious double room tickets to the museum a copy of the sumptuous hardback exhibition book a box of Belgian chocolates and a customised Magritte-Amigo amenity. Furthermore the hotel will offer a welcome cocktail in the relaxing atmosphere of the Bar Amigo.
 
For more information or bookings please contact our reservation department via
T +32 2 547 47 66 or email reservations.amigo@roccofortehotels.com
Our offer includes:
• Accommodation for two persons in a luxurious room
• A delicious buffet breakfast with homemade pastries
• freshly baked “Belgian waffles” and seasonal fruits
• 2 entrance passes to the Magritte Museum
• 1 Magritte hardback exhibition book
• Welcome cocktail in our Bar Amigo
• 2 Coffee cups Magritte
• A box of Belgian chocolates
 
Additional: (with supplement)
• Shuttle service/taxi to the Magritte Museum
• Limousine service to and from the airport on request
• Extra nights and room upgrades on request

item.title: Magritte @ Hôtel Métropole
item.body:
Valid on weekends (Friday, Saturday and Sunday nights) and on public holidays.
Discover the city of the famous painter with our “Magritte” package,
 
Our package includes:
    • One ticket per person for “The Magritte Museum”
    • One overnight stay in a Superior room
    • Buffet breakfast in ‘Le Jardin Indien’
    • Belgian candy
    • Bathrobes and slippers at your disposal
    • Welcome drink “Ceci n’est pas un cocktail”
